mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_data_from (id, name, type, remark, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE report_data_from SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, remark = #{remark}, last_update_id = #{userId}, last_update_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT rdf.id, rdf.name, rdf.type, rdf.remark, rdf.create_id AS createId, rdf.create_time AS createTime, rdf.last_update_id AS lastUpdateId, rdf.last_update_time AS lastUpdateTime FROM report_data_from rdf WHERE id = #{id}
